readme:
# Br4ckets Light A Atom Light Theme inspired by the [Brackets](http://brackets.io) Editor Default Color Scheme.
Based on [Br4ckets Sublime Text Theme](https://github.com/l4ci/Br4ckets-Theme). Related Theme: [Br4ckets Dark](https://github.com/sergejmueller/br4ckets-dark)
